Title: As a school user I can see a list of agency companies connected to me.
As a school user I can see if I have any pending invites on my agency listing page.
As a school user I can see if I have any Incoming Requests on my agency listing page.
As a school user I can add an agency company by their Connect Key.
As a school user I can mass invite my agents to Edvisor by pasting/entering a list of emails.
As a school user I can create a Connect ID: a name/code that agents can use to add me on Edvisor.
As a school user I can accept connect requests from agency companies.
As a school user I can see a list of invites I have sent to agency companies which have not been accepted.
As a school user I can reject a connect request from an agency.
As a school user I can resend pending invites to my agencies (or resend all pending invites with one click).
As a school I can see a profile page of my agency.
As a school user I can remove an agency company from my list. (disconnect from them)
As a school user I can see how many applications an agency company has sent me (current year and total).
As a school user I can view my contract.
As a school user I see an alert when a contract has expired.
As a school user I can renew a contract.
As a school user I can send a contract to an agency.
As a school user I can see when an agent has rejected my contract and i can revise/resend.
As a school user I can see a message asking me to send a contract if there isn't one.
As a school user I can make edits to my contract before sending and save those edits (update my default contract with the edits I've made).
As a school user I can print my contract
As a school user I can see the agency information in profile
As a school user I can see contract information
As an agency user I will receive a notification when a school sends me a connect request.
As a school user I get a notification when a contract is expiring in less than a month.
As an agent I get notified when a contract i have with a school is expiring in less than a month
As an agent I get notified when a contract is expired.
As a school user I get a notification when a contract is expired.
Update school app to accommodate new relation between agency company and school company
[Agency FE] - Schools no longer show when sending enrollments
[Agency FE] - Changed eUser relation to schoolRelationship rather than school
